conbody.p: The top-level view of the Management Console displays quick links to thse most used resources and views:

ul.li: Blue buttons are for features also available for administrators and application developers (see ).

Green buttons expose functionality available only to administrators:
Configure Available Services Opens the Cluster Nodes view that shows which roles are running on which nodes. From this view you can add or remove Service roles on the various nodes in the cluster (or on 127.0.0.1 for micro clouds)
Manage Organizations Opens the Organizations view
Manage Users Opens the Users view.
View All Deployed Applications Open the Applications view
View Cloud Events Opens the Cloud Events
View Dashboard Opens the Dashboard

conbody.p: Available system patches, new releases, and the latest news are also displayed on this view.
